attributes.action: Stop the Brexit festival and use the money for frontline workers
attributes.additional_details: Brexit is not to be celebrated and the majority of British don’t support brexit as it is
attributes.background: Not have a brexit festival and use the money for worthy causes

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you do not want Festival UK* 2022 to go ahead, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to do with the funds that would otherwise be spent on this. Your title refers to frontline workers but the main text of your petition refers to worthy causes.
                
You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like the Government to do.
